= Introduction =

The Drop R2 has the following two libraries.

(1) 3DMath
(2) 3DGraph

We have finally all the libraries and an app to work on:
*  3DMath
*  3DGraph
*  3DModel
*  3DAddobj
*  3DDispobj



= Details =

Using this we can do very basic math and graphics.
